website_summaries.verdict: The Reebok Ridgerider Leather is built for the outdoors, be it for walking around the neighborhood or easy trails in the woods. It features a full-length rubber outsole with prominent lugs that help bite the ground during treks.Meanwhile, the leather upper provides a protective and supportive wrap. Despite calls for better arch support, the Ridgerider Leather has been commended for the comfort it offers during long walks.
pros: Almost all of the owners are pleased with how comfortable the Reebok Ridgerider Leather felt on their feet
Many reviewers are impressed that this product held up well after several months of rigorous use
Consumers are more than happy to repurchase this pair of Reebok walking shoes because it is affordable for its quality build
According to plenty of folks, this trainer is suitable for walking on pavements and uneven surfaces
The rugged style of this footgear appeals to a lot of shoppers
cons: Some people have complained that the Ridgerider Leather felt heavy on their feet
A few users wish this walking trainer offered more arch support

customer_reviews.title: Columbia) and these are holding up just fine. And
customer_reviews.text: I'm 2 months into wearing these while walking 50 miles per week over asphalt, cement, gravel and grass. I normally get 3-4 months wear out of other brands (Nike, Timberland, Columbia) and these are holding up just fine. And, they are very comfortable and less expensive. Traction is also great. The right shoe has just developed a stitch breaking at the big toe but a little glue will easily fix it. Will be buying these again when I wear them out. Good value for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: The One Who Knows

customer_reviews.title: Good sneaker with one caveat
customer_reviews.text: The sneaker is comfortable and the aggressive tread pattern comes in handy in the northeast when there is a couple of inches of snow on the ground to navigate. FYI for orthotics users: This is the first sneaker or shoe that I can recall purchasing that insoles are attached with glue, so they are not easily removed. I needed to forcefully pull the insole out of the sneaker and was left with a substantial lump of glue and insole remnants in the heel area. I removed most of the glue material with a heat gun and flat blade screw driver. It was a messy endeavor, but it did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: gjrob

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: I really needed a decent pair of walking/terrain shoes for work. Especially because it was all black to boot. Much like recent Rebook shoes I’ve owned in the past they were extremely comfortable. My two minor but easily overlooked discrepancies; is one it was just a tad looser than what I expected. Second the material doesn’t appear to be as durable. I wouldn’t use these for regular hikes. Overall they’re great for my intended purposes.
customer_reviews.author: David Kyle Leighton

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of walking at work. I usually use 2 pair per year. Comfort is important to me. I had bought other brands the last couple of years because they were lower in price. Glad I spent a little more and went back to Reeboks.
customer_reviews.author: Terrence Palmer

customer_reviews.title: COMFORT IS FINALLY HERE!
customer_reviews.text: Probably THE MOST comfortable Reebok I've ever worn. Laces are NOT TOO long, {perfect} tongue also proper length and very easy to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P. Dyer

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure they'll hold up better than the Nike's and New Balance that fell apart ...
customer_reviews.text: They fit well. I'm sure they'll hold up better than the Nike's and New Balance that fell apart after less than 1 year.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if they will last long, but they dont make my feet hurt. On my feet at work a lot as a Corrections Officer. These look enough like Boots, that I can wear them. And, my feet feel better. That is good enough for me. 30 years of wrestling, Judo, BJJ, and Lifting has wrecked havoc on the feet.
customer_reviews.author: Somboplayer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: The hubby goes through about a pair of shoes a month for his work (a lot of walking involved) and I usually buy him just the plain white $15-20 shoes from Costco when they have them. However he was running low so I decided to splurge and buy him a pai of these Reebok shoes. He loves them. Says they are really comfortable and he is not looking forward to the cheap brand. I have bought him 3 pair of these already and will continue to get them for him.
customer_reviews.author: Happy in Hillsboro

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Comfortable Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I wear these regularly, for daily use though they are supposed to be running shoes. They are strong, stable, comfortable. I prefer these to the Saucony Omni Walker...I also have a pair of these.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Musere

customer_reviews.title: Reebok Men's Ridgerider Leather Sneaker- MADE IN CHINA
customer_reviews.text: These Reebok's fit somewhat tight given it's my usual size, then I noticed they are MADE IN CHINA so that explains it. I'll keep them but I'll looking at different brands in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: A great shoe for walking and Gym training
customer_reviews.text: I am a Group fitness Instructor. Used to have nothing but Reebok's till 10 years ago. Now, resumed Reebok. This shoe is great for Weight training and walking, comfortable and durable. Got two pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Fitnesspro22

customer_reviews.title: Husband Loves Them
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these, and he is very picky about his shoes. After trying these on, he declared, "From now on I am only wearing Reebok sneakers." They look amazing, and he says they are very comfortable. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy - NJ

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: Even though I purchased a 4E wide it still fits snug. My feet are not that big and I wanted the shoes to be roomy but again just a tad snug. Other then that I like them.......
customer_reviews.author: Vin

customer_reviews.title: Runs a bit shorter than normal
customer_reviews.text: These were about a size or a half size to small for me, i wear a size 12 but they fit like an 11 or 11.5z I liked them from what I could tell. But had a quick and easy return.
customer_reviews.author: Erock94

customer_reviews.title: looks like grandpas walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfortable but they look like cheap, old man shoes. I donated them...
customer_reviews.author: dizzle

customer_reviews.title: Not a comfortable Sneaker for my taste
customer_reviews.text: These were very bulky and hurt my feet. Gave them some time to break in but shoes just did not get comfortable. Not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Member

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved these shoes, fit great, shipped very fast and liked so much he ordered 2 more pairs. No problems at all. Awesome
customer_reviews.author: Tamsk

customer_reviews.title: Nice price, good snug fit
customer_reviews.text: I’m an avid runner but have had knee issues. I need a very thick sole that ties tightly. This shoe is awesome. Takes away any pain.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Napier

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Are wider than regular fit but ok withat.husband happy.ordered another pair.
customer_reviews.author: theresaspradlin

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe at reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: These were for my husband and he absolutely loves them. They are a perfect fit and at a price that he loved. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Eesepower

customer_reviews.title: so glad to recieve my shoes
customer_reviews.text: Theses are what I always buy, they are so comfortable. I walk my German Shepard twice a day and they hold up pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Jd

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, took them on vacation and dang near walked the soles off of them in the heat Great shoe, great fit, will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff & Amy McBryar

customer_reviews.title: Reebok's always a winner for me.
customer_reviews.text: Reebok shoes always seem to fit me better than other brands. The only reason these didn't get 5 stars, was the soles tend to slide on wet floors. I'll just have to be careful where I walk. Other than that they're great. Comfortable all day.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart A

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I live these shoes...wear them to work at least 3 times a week.
customer_reviews.author: RONALD NEAL

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always worn Reebok shoes in this style. They fit my feet well and they are long lasting. Delivery was fast and it was exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable, and I walked through a river wearing these - so they hold up to torture just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rajagopal

customer_reviews.title: Not a good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Did not like this shoe,horrible on the foot an heel
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Purkel

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are great but the insoles are very thin. I replaced with some good arch support insoles and now they feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Helderman

customer_reviews.title: Use it to go to work and it looks like a shoe and fits great
customer_reviews.text: Just what was expected. Use it to go to work and it looks like a shoe and fits great. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ken R.

customer_reviews.title: Best to get other colors unless you have orthotics
customer_reviews.text: All white version does not come with insoles!!! Best to get other colors unless you have orthotics, etc Very uncomfortable without them otherwise shoes okay. These Reebok Ridgeriders size 10 US fit seems bigger than Brooks Glycerin size 10 US one.
customer_reviews.author: Client d'Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Good, but needs better quality control
customer_reviews.text: I use these shoes for work, they are very comfortable and my first pair lasted me approximately 8 months (very good for me) however my last 2 pairs have started to split from the sole of the shoe very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: david potts

customer_reviews.title: Awesome service!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome service! Received my shoes very quickly, I would highly recommend buying the Reebok Men's Ridgerider shoes. Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Rick Cantu

customer_reviews.title: Cheap disaster
customer_reviews.text: After use them only 4 times I already have broken line on the side quality is 0
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Trajanovski

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I always love Reebok shoes and this is no exception. Reliable shoes and fit great.
customer_reviews.author: DanDude05

customer_reviews.title: Good comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Took about a week to break in but now feels comfortable. Not quite as comfortable as work n cushion but a pretty good shoe overall.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert J.

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoe!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit great! Will buy another pair. They are comfortable right out of the box. Well made time will tell. Can't say enough how great they are.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as good as the ten or twelve previous Reeboks.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Burton

customer_reviews.title: Coming unglued after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: My shoes are 4 months old and the soles are already starting to come unglued. The shoes are shorter than other Reeboks I've had.
customer_reviews.author: Luana H. Bond

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and fits perfectly. For a chubby man like me this shoes fit perfectly and comfortable. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits like I went into the store, because the information on site was correct.
customer_reviews.author: cleet

customer_reviews.title: Light Weight
customer_reviews.text: If you like light weight sneaker these are for you, prefer some weight.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes but the soles are not
customer_reviews.text: Within the first two weeks the sole became unglued and shows became unwearable
customer_reviews.author: Asim Husain

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good pair of shoes to work. They came in time and fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: ags

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought them from my husband, he says they are very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Liuset Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like how it's more like hiking shoes than walking shoes
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit. Very comfortable and they look great.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie H

customer_reviews.title: comfortable shoes. The size is true to size
customer_reviews.text: These are very well made, comfortable shoes. The size is true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Reebok Men's Ridgerider Leather Sneaker
product_meta.description: Let it rip on rugged trails with this Reebok Ridge rider Trail 2.0. Built for tackling tough terrain, the aggressive lugs on the outsole bite and grip. A breathable upper ventilates while it supports.
